summary: This header file provides MTA-specific definitions for sendmail, including functions and macros for character quoting/dequoting and string comparison. It defines utility functions for string manipulation used throughout the sendmail application.

logs.reason: Used as a tag for heap checking and memory allocation tracking when SM_HEAP_CHECK > 2. This is not an actual log message, but a debugging tag.
logs.resolution: This is a debugging tag, not an error that requires resolution. It appears only when heap checking is enabled at a high level.
